title: Frontend Development Quiz
description: React, TypeScript, modern frontend frameworks and tools

questions.question: What is React?
options: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces
questions.explanation: React is a JavaScript library developed by Facebook for building user interfaces, especially for web applications.

questions.question: What does TypeScript add to JavaScript?
questions.explanation: TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript, helping catch errors at compile time.

questions.question: React components must be class-based.
questions.explanation: React components can be either class-based or function-based. Function components with hooks are now preferred.
